entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 12. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
